learningpod.title: R5_L029_Q03 [IMAGE] Based on its role in the sentence, what can you tell about the word vexed ?

p.b: A sore throat vexed Lucas in the week before the talent show.

questionBody.p: Based on its role in the sentence, what can you tell about the word vexed ?

simpleChoice.p: The word vexed is a verb. It tells what the sore throat did to Lucas.
The word vexed is an adjective. It describes Lucas.
The word vexed is an adverb. It describes how Lucas felt.
The word vexed is a noun. It names an illness.
